attributes.action: A general election is needed in 2016 to elect a moral & trustworthy leader
attributes.additional_details: Social unrest and a lack of belief and confidence in our politicians has brought about the vote in the EU referendum. Citizens want their decisions and views to be heard and considered and the societal divide needs to be broken down. We are a collection of countries that should unite to ensure that decisions are fair for all and that our own are being looked after first and foremost. Our countries need to work as a community and collective with our own interests at the fore.
attributes.background: The UK needs strong leadership and direction whilst we leave the EU and our people must be at the heart of everything. There is no confidence in the Conservative party and it is essential that the public is allowed to vote on the leadership of our country at this time. We want to be heard!
